field_speakers.processed: Raffaello Pantucci, senior fellow at the S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Nanyang Technological University

field_description.processed: As part of the University of Virginia's "Assessment of China's Belt and Road Initiative" project, the UVA East Asia Center will be joined by Raffaello Pantucci, senior fellow at the S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Nanyang Technological University, for a discussion of his new book Sinostan: China's Inadvertent Empire, co-authored with Alexandros Peterson. This online talk will be held Friday, March 3, from 10:00 - 11:30 a.m. To attend, please complete the webinar registration at https://bit.ly/SinostanUVA
